text: Allah ne tumhare liye tumhare gharon ko jaaye sukoon banaya, usne jaanwaron ki khaalon (skins) se tumhare liye aisey makan paida kiye jinhein tum safar aur qayaam, dono haalaton mein halka patey ho. Usne jaanwaron ke souf aur oun aur baalon se (soft fur and wool and hair) pehanne aur baratne (use) ki bahut si cheezein paida kardi jo zindagi ki muddat e muqarrara tak tumhare kaam aati hain
